entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:59 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 10:00 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
